Package org.bohdansharubin.services

Class ClothesService

java.lang.Object
org.bohdansharubin.services.ClothesService
public class ClothesService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing and searching Clothes objects.

Provides methods for adding and filtering clothes based on different criteria such as type, color, and size.

    • findClothesInEuropeanSizeBetween

      public List<Clothes> findClothesInEuropeanSizeBetween(int min, int max)
      Finds clothes within a European size range.
      Parameters:
      min - minimum size (exclusive)
      max - maximum size (inclusive)
      Returns:
      list of clothes within the specified size range
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if min is greater than or equal to max
